data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Queensland, Australia.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Queensland, Australia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 610,438 believers in Queensland to start simple multiplying churches in their homes.
Spirit, please defend the 610,438 believers in Queensland against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.
Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 1,573,078 who are far from you in Queensland, Australia from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Queensland, Australia, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 610,438 believers in the state of Queensland.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.section_summary:
the state of Queensland, Australia has a population of 4,332,700.

We estimate Queensland has 610,438 people who might know Jesus, 2,149,184 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,573,078 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 7 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Queensland.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

location.name: Queensland
location.cities_list: Brisbane, Gold Coast, Logan City, Townsville, Cairns
location.cities_list_w_pop: Brisbane (2,189,878), Gold Coast (591,473), Logan City (282,673), Townsville (196,219), Cairns (153,075)
